item.title: THE OTHER CLUB *LIVE*... On the War in the Middle East [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
The Other Club with Mike and Tim ~ November 1, 2023
This episode is from a LIVE recording of The Other Club from October 24, 2023, from Trinity Baptist Church, where Dr. Michael Thiessen and Tim Tysoe talk about the current war in the Middle East (Gaza & Israel) between Hamas and other genocidal Muslims and Israel.

Episode Resources: Nabeel Qureshi: "Why I stopped believing Islam is a religion of peace" | Premier Christian Radio: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2htOWOF4gqs; Seeking Allah, Finding Jesus by Nabeel Qureshi: https://www.amazon.ca/Seeking-Allah-Finding-Jesus-Christianity/dp/0310527236;

MUST WATCH: Muslims BLAST Jordan Peterson for Supporting Israel Against Hamas | Acts 17 Apologetics ft. David Wood, Robert Spencer, and the Apostate Prophet (AP): https://apologetics315.com/videos/acts-17-apologetics/?wchannelid=7gugggjeoo&wmediaid=udbbfnjiie; The TRUE Face of Islam and Decolonization | Liberty Dispatch: https://rumble.com/v3py8ja-the-true-face-of-islam-and-decolonization.html;

MUST READ: What Every Christian Needs to Know About the Qur'an | James R. White: https://www.amazon.ca/Every-Christian-Needs-About-Quran/dp/0764209760/ref=sr_1_1?crid=ASYF7A804TAB&keywords=what+every+christians+needs+to+know+about+islam&qid=1697579362&s=books&sprefix=what+e+very+chrsitians+needs+to+know+about+islam%2Cstripbooks%2C84&sr=1-1

item.title: Deanna McLeod Pt. 6.2: ”Protecting Pregnancy and Breastfeeding” in a Vaccine CRAZY World... Continued! [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ October 28, 2023
Once again, Mike is joined by Canadian Covid Care Alliance (CCCA) clinical researcher Deanna McLeod, founder of Kaleidoscope Strategic and Covid Sense, to continue their discussion on protecting pregnancy and breastfeeding in a post-COVID world. 

DID YOU MISS PART 6.1?!
WATCH HERE: https://rumble.com/v3p6rpd-deanna-mcleod-pt.-6-protecting-pregnancy-and-breastfeeding-in-a-vaccine-cra.html;
LISTEN HERE: https://open.spotify.com/episode/4LKQ0nAmmj1lh5JhlTe5Jf?si=46cd992340c549bd; 

Episode Resource: Canadian COVID Care Alliance: https://www.canadiancovidcarealliance.org/; 

DID YOU MISS THEM!?! - Be sure to watch Mike's previous discussions with Deanna:
Deanna McLeod: Pt 1. Omicron Boosters - Untested, Unsafe and Ineffective: https://rumble.com/v1tpjsw-deanna-mcleod-why-we-must-stop-the-shots-pt.-1-ineffective-untested-and-uns.html;
Deanna McLeod Pt. 2: Myocarditis and the Vaccines: https://rumble.com/v1votgi-deanna-mcleod-why-we-must-stop-the-shots-pt.-2-myocarditis-and-other-seriou.html; 
Deanna McLeod Pt. 3: Big Pharma and Vaccine Conflict of Interest: https://rumble.com/v246yo4-deanna-mcleod-pt.-3-vaccine-conflicts-of-interest.html; 
Deanna McLeod Pt. 4: "AGILE Regulations" - Circumventing Regulatory Barriers for Profit: https://rumble.com/v2nbl3e-deanna-mcleod-pt.-4-agile-regulations-circumventing-regulatory-barriers-for.html; 
Deanna McLeod Pt. 5: ”AGILE Regulations” - Why We MUST Demand PROVEN SAFETY OVER PROFIT: https://rumble.com/v2prkno-deanna-mcleod-pt.-5-agile-regulations-why-we-must-demand-proven-safety-over.html.

item.title: Understanding Islam ft. Dr. David Wood [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ October 21, 2023
On this episode of Open Mike, in the wake of the tumult in the Middle East, Dr. Thiessen is joined by Dr. David Wood to discuss Islam, its main beliefs and practices, its various sects, and why its adherents are often involved in violent acts. YOU'RE DEFINITELY NOT GOING TO WANT TO MISS THIS ONE!

Episode Resource: Apologetics315: https://apologetics315.com/videos/acts-17-apologetics/; Nabeel Qureshi: "Why I stopped believing Islam is a religion of peace" | Premier Christian Radio: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2htOWOF4gqs; Seeking Allah, Finding Jesus by Nabeel Qureshi: https://www.amazon.ca/Seeking-Allah-Finding-Jesus-Christianity/dp/0310527236;
